form.LN: Običajna oblika od ‘will not’ je v govoru ‘won't’.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
will happen
, hočemo povedati, da se bo zgodilo v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: Inflation is rising and will continue to rise.
Perhaps this time it won't rain.
Perhaps when I am fifty I will have forgotten.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
will do something
, hočemo povedati, da določen človek namerava nekaj storiti ali pa je zanj sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: I will never betray you.
People won't admit that they can't read.

sense.def:
Izraz
will
uporabimo v ponudbah, vabilih ali zahtevah.

seg.quote: Will you have a whisky, Doctor?
Will you do me a favour?
Will you shut up!

sense.def:
Z izrazom
will
tudi povemo, da je nekdo ali nekaj sposoben nekaj storiti.

seg.quote: This will cure anything.
The car won't go.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
will
tudi povemo, da sklepamo ali domnevamo, da je nekaj res, ker je verjetno ali navadno tako.

seg.quote: You will probably already be a member of a union.
You will already have gathered that I don't like her.
The bonus will usually be paid automatically.

sense.def:
Will
je odločenost, da bomo nekaj storili.

seg.quote: He lacked will and ambition.
Their marriage became a fierce battle of wills.
I must abide by the will of the people.
It is the will of Allah.

sense.def:
To will something to happen
pomeni z duševnim in ne telesnim naporom poskusiti doseči, da bi se nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: I willed my trembling legs to walk straight.

sense.def:
Kadar lahko nekaj storimo
at will
, tisto lahko storimo, kadarkoli želimo.

seg.quote: Chang told us that we could wander around at will.

sense.def:
A will
je uradna listina, v kateri piše, kaj želimo, da se zgodi z našim denarjem in lastnino po naši smrti.

seg.quote: Has Des made a will?
